Text: Tripcombi:  It does this by using hidden flight routing and hidden city ticketing techniques.

<Text: Tripcombi:  In March 2015, Tripdelta took part in the third batch of the Microsoft Ventures Accelerator in Berlin.>

Text: Tripcombi:  The company is based in Cologne, Germany and was recently voted as one of "Germany's Top 25 Hottest Young Companies" by the newspaper Horizont.
